pages.text:
$
$
/$
$
$
$
$
Meetings & Events
/$
$
Host Your Event in Paradise
/$
$
Looking for a destination that inspires creativity, connection, and collaboration? At Grassy Flats, we provide the perfect setting for unforgettable corporate retreats, meetings, and incentive trips in the heart of the Florida Keys.
​
Whether you're organizing a yoga retreat, family reunion, a group getaway, or a company team building weekend, our boutique resort offers the ideal setting to cultivate balance, connection, and well-being.
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
/$
$
All-In-One Destination for Business & Leisure
/$
$
Our resort offers everything you need in one breathtaking location, from comfortable accommodations and leisure activities to exceptional dining experiences. Focus on your agenda while we handle the rest, allowing your team to transition effortlessly from business sessions to seaside relaxation.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
On-Site Catering & Custom Menus
/$
$
Great events start with great food. Elevate your event with locally inspired cuisine, tailored to your group's preferences. Our culinary team offers fresh, flavorful options for every occasion—whether it’s a sunrise breakfast meeting, a casual lunch, or a formal evening dinner. We create meals that suit your style—whether that’s light and wellness-focused, indulgent and tropical, or somewhere in between.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Water-Based Wellness & Team Building Experiences
/$
$
Surrounded by the sparkling waters of the Florida Keys, Grassy Flats offers immersive activities designed to restore balance and build camaraderie. From sandbar sailing trips to yoga on The Palm Deck, our wellness and adventure experiences are curated to recharge your team and strengthen connections in a truly unforgettable setting.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Boutique Accommodations for Rest & Renewal
/$
$
Our 38 thoughtfully appointed rooms—including standard rooms and spacious 2- and 3-bedroom suites—provide a peaceful escape after a day of productivity and play. Perfect for small to midsize groups (10–50 guests), our accommodations offer privacy, comfort, and a touch of tropical luxury to ensure your team feels refreshed and rejuvenated throughout their stay.
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
Custom Group Packages & Signature Experiences
/$
$
$
$
/$
$
Fishing Trips
/$
$
Treat your guests to an experience on the water with The Rhum Line, our exclusive fishing charter. Guided by local captains, your group can fish, unwind, and enjoy drinks and stories. Perfect for incentive trips, bachelor weekends, or corporate bonding. For a truly elevated adventure, The Rhum Line also offers customized charter trips to the Bahamas, for unforgettable memories in a world-class destination.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Family Reunions
/$
$
With multi-bedroom suites, Grassy Flats is perfect for family reunions, anniversaries, and birthdays. Enjoy:
Group dinners under the stars
Day trips and island excursions
Relaxed time by the pool
Activities for all ages
We make it easy for families and friends to come together and make memories.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Bachelorette Parties
/$
$
Celebrate your next chapter island-style with curated packages that include:
Private yoga
Boat days and snorkeling adventures
Beach bonfires and champagne sunsets
Reserved dinner experiences
Let us help you create the ultimate sendoff for the bride-to-be: fun, stress-free, and totally Instagram-worthy.
/$
/$
$
$
/$
$
Corporate Retreats
/$
$
Trade the boardroom for oceanside views! With boutique accommodations, flexible meeting spaces, and team-building adventures, your group can focus, connect, and recharge.
Your team can enjoy:
Air-conditioned outdoor tent meeting space
On-site catering
Curated team building activities
Relaxation and informal networking
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
Plan Your Next Event in Paradise
/$
$
Let our team help you craft a group experience that’s relaxed, meaningful, and unforgettable.
/$
$

On-Site Group Activities

/$
$
$
$
$
Let's Plan your retreat
/$
$
Whether you're planning a corporate retreat, wellness weekend, or a celebration in the Florida Keys, Grassy Flats offers the space, service, and setting to make it unforgettable. Our team is here to help you design an experience that reflects your goals, your group, and your style—right down to the last sunset.
​
Please fill out the form for a personalized quote or itinerary.
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
